about_the_game:
Welcome to The Hidden Room - Pyramid, a gripping adventure that will take you through an extraordinary journey into the world and culture of ancient Mesoamerican civilizations.

Get ready to explore the depths of the Pyramid and solve the riddles and mysteries that await you along the way. Each step will bring you closer to the truth hidden behind the ancient secrets of this monumental structure.

What lies beyond the last gate? Perhaps you will find the remains of an ancient civilization with advanced technology, or perhaps you will find nothing but the silence of eternity. The only certainty is that only by playing can you find out.

Face inspiring challenges, solve intricate puzzles, and immerse yourself in what were the beliefs and knowledge of those mysterious civilizations.

Play now and be transported on a journey that will change you forever. The Pyramid waits, ready to reveal its secrets only to those who prove themselves brave enough to face the unknown.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050/AMD RX560 (2GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7/AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660/AMD RX580 (>4GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
